CodogenyDN

I'm a simulation chemical physicist and technical programmer who has a lot of experience in both statistical mechanics and ab initio simulation. I've spent most of my time as a programmer attempting to elucidate the dynamical details of glassy substances, a problem which constitutes one of the biggest problems of modern physics.
